column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " The Platypus Bears have no juice left , but Mako and Bolin are still fresh and juicy ! "
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " The Fire Ferrets come from waaay behind and steal the win !
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra ... what can I say ?
#Text=You really came alive in that last round .
#Text=The way you dodged their attacks ... you are a natural .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks , but I ca n't take all the credit .
